summary: Tool is an American rock band from Los Angeles, formed in 1990. The band includes Maynard James Keenan (vocals), Adam Jones (guitar), Danny Carey (drums), and Justin Chancellor (bass), who joined in 1995. They've won four Grammy Awards and toured worldwide. Tool has released five studio albums, with their first, "Undertow," in 1993, and their latest, "Fear Inoculum," in 2019. They mix music with visual arts and have sold over 13 million albums in the U.S. alone. Their unique style blends progressive rock, psychedelic rock, and art rock.
title: Tool (band)
